i1.blurb: Upon dying, Karthus enters a spirit form that allows him to continue casting spells for 7 seconds.
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} Upon taking [[death|fatal damage]], '''Karthus''' remains active for 7 seconds, rendering himself unable to move, [[basic attack|attack]], or use item actives/passives, but becoming {{tip|untargetable}} and {{tip|Invulnerability|invulnerable}} for the duration as well as being able to use [[Champion ability|abilities]] at no cost.
If {{ai|Defile|Karthus}} has been learned, it will remain toggled on for ''Death Defied's'' entire duration at no mana cost.
i1.name: Death Defied
notes: * ''Death Defied'' will always trigger after revival effects ({{ii|Guardian Angel}}, {{ai|Chronoshift|Zilean}}) and if '''Karthus''' is killed by the [[Nexus Obelisk]].
* '''Karthus''' will still benefit from cooldown reduction during ''Death Defied''.
* After ''Death Defied'' ends, the corpse of '''Karthus''' will retain body block despite being dead on the ground.

q1.blurb: Karthus unleashes a delayed blast at a location, dealing damage to nearby enemies.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} After a {{fd|0.5}}-second delay, '''Karthus''' detonates the target area in the cursor's direction, dealing {{tip|magic damage|{{as|magic damage}}}} to all enemies within, '''doubled''' when hitting only one target.
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|45 to 125}} {{as|(+ 30% AP)}}|Enhanced Magic Damage|{{ap|45*2 to 125*2}} {{as|(+ 60% AP)}}}}
q1.name: Lay Waste
notes: * ''Lay Waste's'' single-target damage is listed as a {{tip|critical strike}} both in-game (damage text) and in post-game screen ('Largest Critical Strike') but it cannot actually {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} nor will it scale with {{iis|Infinity Edge}} modifier.
* ''Lay Waste'' has a different sound effect when it only hits one target.
* If ''Lay Waste'' only hits one target it will apply {{tip|single target}} [[spell effects]].

w1.blurb: Karthus creates a passable screen of leeching energy. Any enemy units that walk through the screen have their Movement Speed and Magic Resist reduced for a period.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Karthus''' creates a wall at the target location for 5 seconds and grants {{tip|sight}} around it.

For the duration, all units who cross it are both {{tip|slow|slowed}} for 4 seconds, reduced by 50% over the first second, decaying over its duration and {{sti|magic penetration|{{as|lose 15% magic resistance}}}} for the same duration.
w1.name: Wall of Pain
notes: * The {{tip|sight}} is granted around ''Wall of Pain's'' pillars but not the wall itself.
* ''Wall of Pain'' can only affect any given unit once per cast.
* ''Wall of Pain'' is not considered ''terrain'' for {{ai|Searing Charge|Ornn}}.

e1.blurb: Karthus passively steals energy from his victims, gaining Mana on each kill. Alternatively, Karthus can surround himself in the souls of his prey, dealing damage to nearby enemies, but quickly draining his own Mana.
description: {{sbc|Toggle Off:}} '''Karthus''' restores {{sti|{{as|mana}}}} whenever he kills a unit.
{{sbc|Toggle On:}} '''Karthus''' deals {{as|magic damage}} per second to all nearby units.
e1.name: Defile
notes: * ''Defile'' also restores {{tip|mana}} if ''Karthus'' destroys an enemy structure.
* ''Defile'' will automatically toggle on during {{ai|Death Defied|Karthus}}.

r1.blurb: After channeling for 3 seconds, Karthus deals damage to all enemy champions.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Karthus''' {{ct|channel|channels|attack=false|cast=false|items=false,true|move=false|spells=true,interrupts,false,false,false}} for 3 seconds and deals {{as|magic damage}} to all enemy {{tip|champions}} upon its completion.
r1.name: Requiem
notes: * ''Requiem's'' channel is telegraphed to all enemy champions by a beam of light that descends on all targets.
** The beam will be applied to untargetable enemies, although they will not take damage if they are still untargetable when the damage is applied.
** There is no visible beam if the enemy champion respawns during ''Requiem's'' channel, yet damage is applied normally.
* '''Karthus''' cannot cast ''Requiem'' if {{ais|Death Defied|Karthus}} duration is less than 3 seconds.
